verbs.description: [ARG0: israel] [V: defends] [ARG1: trump] [ARGM-LOC: amid synagogue shooting criticism] [ARGM-ADV: with president] donald trump getting a cool welcome from the jewish community in pittsburgh israel envoy to the memorial ceremonies for the synagogue shooting victims has come to his defense saying it was unfair and wrong to link him to the tragedy trump was greeted by hundreds of chanting protesters tuesday many accusing the president fiery rhetoric for contributing to the climate of violence and emboldening extremists to act donald trump israel trump president donald trump
